A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible writing\, pointless and inconsequential subplots\, and ridiculous\, cringeworthy scenes and dialog put this Star Wars movie in the junk pile along with the prequels. TFA set this trilogy up beautifully\, and this movie stomps all over over it like a piece of trash. A total wasted opportunity; Disney should be ashamed of themselves.
